title: An innovative Schiff-base colorimetric chemosensor for the selective detection of Cu2+ ions and its applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23083-23094
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03097D, Paper

Ram Kumar, Bholey Singh, Parveen Gahlyan, Abhishek Verma, Mamta Bhandari, Rita Kakkar, Balaram Pani
A Schiff-base colorimetric chemosensor has been synthesized for the selective detection of Cu2+ ions and its potential application in the detection of Cu2+ in the solid state and in real water samples has also been demonstrated.
